text: Had several issues with the Refurbished: HP ENVY x360 15-bq276nr 15.6" FHD Touchscreen Laptop Ryzen 5 2500U 12GB 1TB since day one. Wi-Fi drops intermittently and the speakers feels cheap. Performance in AAA gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the Refurbished: HP ENVY x360 15-bq276nr 15.6" FHD Touchscreen Laptop Ryzen 5 2500U 12GB 1TB. It blue screens occasionally frequently when playing Elden Ring, and the performance throttles significantly. The port selection has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Avoid the Refurbished: HP ENVY x360 15-bq276nr 15.6" FHD Touchscreen Laptop Ryzen 5 2500U 12GB 1TB if you can. The overall performance is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. Battery drains incredibly fast, even on light tasks.. Looking to return it.
